alert_rule.name: AVD-High-Alert
alert_rule.description: Connection success degradation detected on host/session path.
recommended_actions: Validate host pool session distribution and drain overloaded hosts.
Review recent gateway/session connection failures and retry trends.
Check FSLogix/profile and disconnection events in corresponding timeframe.
monitoring: Track per-host success rate and disconnect spikes hourly.
Track FSLogix error count and remediation completion status.
